title: Sound On: Recession Threat, Biden-Xi Talks, Sanctions
itunes:title: Sound On: Recession Threat, Biden-Xi Talks, Sanctions
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget President, Maya MacGuineas, Brian O'Toole, senior fellow at the Atlantic Council's GeoEconomics Center, Bloomberg Politics Contributor Rick Davis and Third Way Co-Founder and Democratic Strategist, Jim Kessler.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
